api.id: get from JSON view of the connection. Choose the id property of the api object. The path should contain /managedApis/

connection.id: get from JSON view of the connection. Choose the id property of the root object. The path should contain /providers/Microsoft.Web/connections/

azuresentinel.connectionRuntimeUrl: get from Outputs of Connector template deployment. Step 5 of installation guide.

teams.connectionRuntimeUrl: get from Outputs of Connector template deployment. Step 5 of installation guide.
